feed.title: Niladri Shekhar Dutt
feed.subtitle:
I am a Research Engineer at [Ready Player Me](https://readyplayer.me/) working on Generative AI x 3D. I completed my master's in Computer Vision at University College London (UCL) advised by [Prof. Niloy Mitra](http://www0.cs.ucl.ac.uk/staff/n.mitra/). Previously, I was a Founding Engineer at NFTPort leading machine learning from its inception through its Series A round of $26M. Prior to that, I was a visiting student at the University of California, Berkeley where I worked with Dr Brandie Nonnecke on ML x social network analysis. I have also spent time as a research intern at Nvidia and IIT Kharagpur.

I am interested in generating and editing 3D content (particularly meshes that are compatible with graphics engines) using text instructions, images or other simple modalities. I believe solving this requires a fundamental understanding of shape design- *what makes a sofa well-designed and functional?*
